doc.title: Bobby Short at the Cafe Carlyle
doc.plot: The reigning King of Cafe Society performs a thrilling 25-song set, including classics from Cole Porter, Gershwin and Sondheim, with the style and verve that's been packing them in at the New York Cafe Carlyle for over 20 years. Plus, we go into Bobby's home for an exclusive and intimate look at the man behind the music. No Cover. No Minimum. Just lots of great music.
